summary: Clara doesn't know what she wants to do with her life, until one day she meets Guilherme who helps her to find her own path.
cast: Clarice Falcão|Rodrigo Pandolfo|Nelson Freitas|Bianca Byington|Leandro Hassum|Augusto Madeira|Priscilla Rozenbaum|Alexandre Nero|Kiko Mascarenhas|Bel Garcia|Gregório Duvivier|Camila Amado|Daniel Filho|Wagner Santisteban|Leandro Soares|George Sauma|Christiana Ubach|Claudia Dourado|Rafaela Prado|Gabriel Migueis|Franco Salvoni
title: Eu Não Faço a Menor Ideia do Que Eu Tô Fazendo Com a Minha Vida
